LanguageData.OE_Obsidian.label: obsidian
LanguageData.OE_Obsidian.description: Most rare material. Obsidian is extremely strong due to its unique molecular structure.
LanguageData.OE_Mythril.label: mythril
LanguageData.OE_Mythril.description: The most beautiful metal of them all. Just look at this precious...
LanguageData.OE_Platinum.label: platinum
LanguageData.OE_Platinum.description: Beautiful and strong metal used for building of structures, weapons, and machines.
LanguageData.OE_Empyrium.label: empyrium
LanguageData.OE_Empyrium.description: Synthesized metal based on Obsidian using Platinum. This metal is incredibly strong but difficult to build.
LanguageData.OE_Orichalcum.label: orichalcum
LanguageData.OE_Orichalcum.description: Synthesized metal based on Mythril using Platinum. This metal is incredibly beautiful but difficult to build.
